title: Hydra By Zenith E-Juice
description: There are very few things in life that can bring us as much joy and satisfaction as biting into a cold watermelon on a hot July day. Sinking your teeth into a crisp, juicy apple that is perfect with every bite is a sensation that is comparable. Call us crazy, but Hydra was created when Zenith E-Juice decided to combine the two. All throughout the year, Hydra, a watermelon-apple blend, will make you feel absolutely blissful!
